body: I just did an AMA, but I also just got promoted to Jr. Mod, so ask away.
body_tagged: I just did an AMA, but I also just got promoted to Jr. Mod, so ask away.
title: New AMA (Jr. Mod Promotion)

replies.body:
Congrats.

What are you most excited for in being a staff?
replies.body_tagged:
Congrats.

What are you most excited for in being a staff?

replies.body: Where do you live? Favourite food? Favourite fruit? Favourite animal? Favourite colour? Favourite drink? Favourite OCN Map? Favourite Avicus Map? Stimcakes real? Opinions on me?
replies.body_tagged: Where do you live? Favourite food? Favourite fruit? Favourite animal? Favourite colour? Favourite drink? Favourite OCN Map? Favourite Avicus Map? Stimcakes real? Opinions on me?

replies.body:
I like the chatting and banter that comes along with the staff team and the general positive atmosphere. I enjoy helping others, so helping with reports, chat, etc. and helping the staff and server improve as a whole really appeals to me. 

And thanks, appreciated.
replies.body_tagged:
I like the chatting and banter that comes along with the staff team and the general positive atmosphere. I enjoy helping others, so helping with reports, chat, etc. and helping the staff and server improve as a whole really appeals to me. 

And thanks, appreciated.

reply_to.body:
Congrats.

What are you most excited for in being a staff?
reply_to.body_tagged:
Congrats.

What are you most excited for in being a staff?

replies.body:
In Canada, Ontario near Toronto. 
Idek, I have lots of foods I like, I'm a bit of a foodie. 
Favourite fruit is an apple, though I dislike the company/brand.
Favourite animal is the Jaguar.
Favourite colour is red.
Favourite drink is probs ginger ale or root beer.
Favourite OCN map for TDM, CTW and DTC are: Ascendance 2, Golden Drought, Fractal Descent (TE for all) 
Favourite Avicus map is probably Rendezvous New CTW. Basically anything with gameplay and pvp room I enjoy. 
Very, next Saturday is 1 month anniversary.
You can be cool and nice, a bit of the cacal banter, though I don't know you too well, feel free to pm me and talk to me anytime, I'm pretty approachable and friendly.

replies.body: "Mirror, mirror on the wall. Who's the prettiest parabola of them all?"
replies.body_tagged: "Mirror, mirror on the wall. Who's the prettiest parabola of them all?"

replies.body: Gotta fix em' all!
replies.body_tagged: Gotta fix em' all!

replies.body: Oh, and how did you get into Pvp? How did you find out about Avicus and OCN?
replies.body_tagged: Oh, and how did you get into Pvp? How did you find out about Avicus and OCN?

replies.body: PvP was something I was interested in and kinda took pretty far. Splade showed me Avi a while back, I enjoyed it and stayed. OCN I found out about through Avicus.
replies.body_tagged: PvP was something I was interested in and kinda took pretty far. Splade showed me Avi a while back, I enjoyed it and stayed. OCN I found out about through Avicus.

replies.body:
Hiya! Congrats on JR mod!

whos your favourite football team 
favourite song?
whats the best thing about becoming JR mod
replies.body_tagged:
Hiya! Congrats on JR mod!

whos your favourite football team 
favourite song?
whats the best thing about becoming JR mod

replies.body:
Non-american favourite football team, when I still followed it closely, was LFC. First team I watched play and ye. 

Rise Against - Methadone, ridiculously deep lyrically and is just written amazingly, been addicted to this song for almost a week now. 

Getting to communicate with staff more closely and being able to influence things easier (finally). That or the responsibility that comes with it, it's an enjoyable to have tbh.
